title: bane77
author: bane77
content: HiI already search but with no luck, for the script i could convert multiple Bitcoin pub. keys from uncompressed to compressed, and also than all compressed pub. keys to pub. address?If anyone,... ?Thanks in advance!

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Well, do you have a script that can convert one uncompressed key to a compressed key?If that is so, start with that. Then you can write a simple function around it that takes a list of keys like this:Code:#!/usr/bin/python3def to_compressed(key):    # .... return the compressed keydef many_to_compressed(keys):    for key in keys:    print(to_compressed(key))

comments.author: bane77
comments.body: Quote from: NotATether on November 16, 2022, 02:12:34 PMWell, do you have a script that can convert one uncompressed key to a compressed key?If that is so, start with that. Then you can write a simple function around it that takes a list of keys like this:Code:#!/usr/bin/python3def to_compressed(key):    # .... return the compressed keydef many_to_compressed(keys):    for key in keys:    print(to_compressed(key))No not really, couldn't  find not even one, one for one converter for pub. key script. Except https://iancoleman.io/bitcoin-key-compression/   but its in Java and i don't have much clue about coding.

comments.author: bane77
comments.body: Ok, so i found a web to convert multiple pub. key, addresses,.... if some one needs it: https://privatekeys.pw/calc
